alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 22 at 5:56PM MST until September 22 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 1000 PM MST. * At 556 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of normally dry washes, roads, and low lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Quartzsite, Rainbow Acres, La Paz Valley, Highway 95. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 95 between mile markers 98 and 110. AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 14 and 20. This includes the following streams and drainages... Tyson Wash, La Cholla Wash, Scaddan Wash, French Creek, Smith Wash, and Plomosa Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
